author: AdrianoDee
body:
#### PR description:

This is a follow-up to #41632 taking into account the un-resolved comments (see [here](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/41632#issuecomment-1637005874)). 

I took the chance also to apply the changes in the cuts suggested by @CesarBernardes (see slide 5 [here](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1300029/contributions/5465602/attachments/2680232/4649242/pixelTracking_patatrackStudies_05062023_v3.pdf)). This is not strictly needed since all those parameters are tunable from the config, but I would take the chance to push it anyway here.
title: Clean Up for Pixel Tracks - Follow-up to #41632
